question: Match the following:
columnB: Initiated in 1951 and periodically assessed over the past decades
Amongst the first countries in the world to initiate action plans and programmes at a national level to attain total reproductive health as a social goal
Improved programmes covering wider reproduction-related areas currently in operation
Creating awareness among people about various reproduction related aspects and providing facilities and support for building up a reproductively healthy society

answer.India: Amongst the first countries in the world to initiate action plans and programmes at a national level to attain total reproductive health as a social goal
answer.‘Family planning’ programmes: Initiated in 1951 and periodically assessed over the past decades
answer.‘Reproductive and Child Health Care (RCH: Improved programmes covering wider reproduction-related areas currently in operation
answer.Major tasks under RCH programmes: Creating awareness among people about various reproduction related aspects and providing facilities and support for building up a reproductively healthy society
